arts.ttl: Liverpool fans target another Real Madrid star with boos during UCL clash
arts.sum: Sections of the home support in attendance at Liverpool’s meeting with Real Madrid this evening have taken firm aim at Blancos youngster Arda Güler. This comes after Trent Alexander-Arnold was…

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold mural defaced ahead of Liverpool vs. Real Madrid game
arts.sum: Alexander-Arnold infuriated Liverpool fans when he to left his hometown club to join Spanish giant Madrid in July. A mural of Trent Alexander-Arnold was defaced ahead of his return to Liverpool with Real Madrid on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold booed on Liverpool return with Real Madrid
arts.sum: The 27-year-old received a hostile reception on his first appearance at his boyhood club since leaving for Real Madrid in the summer

arts.ttl: Liverpool fans BOO Trent Alexander-Arnold as Real Madrid star warms up on Anfield return - but ex-Reds defender grins through the jeers
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold was greeted by a crescendo of boos upon his return to boyhood club Liverpool as a Real Madrid player.

arts.ttl: UEFA Champions League updates: Liverpool-Real Madrid, PSG-Bayern
arts.sum: Enjoy live updates for all of Tuesday's UEFA Champions League matches, including Liverpool vs. Real Madrid and Paris Saint-Germain vs. Bayern Munich.

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid starting lineup against Liverpool | UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Real Madrid will play one of their toughest fixtures of the season so far tonight when they take on Liverpool at Anfield in the UEFA Champions League. The Merengues have been very solid so far under Xabi Alonso, losing just one match in all competitions, and will be gunning to extend that run tonight. Ahead […] The post Official: Real Madrid starting lineup against Liverpool | UEFA Champions League appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Liverpool v Real Madrid: Champions League – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ Champions League updates, 8pm GMT kick-off ⚽️ Live scores | Read today’s Football Daily | Mail Scott Arne Slot speaks to Amazon Prime. “A great fixture … we’re all looking forward to a game like this … these clubs have met each other multiple times … so it’s a special evening, special occasion, special game … as many times before, I play Florian Wirtz … [laughing] if I play him, you ask about him, and if I don’t play him, you ask about him! … he is the left winger tonight … our high press was most of the time really good [against Villa] … that was positive … open play we didn’t create as much [as at Brentford, Palace or United] but the pressing was better.” As for the reception a certain full-back might get upon returning to his alma mater? “I have no clue … he is an incredible player and a great human being.” Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Real Madrid make major Trent Alexander-Arnold decision ahead of his Liverpool return in the Champions League
arts.sum: The defender is expecting a less-than warm reception when he returns to his boyhood club for the first time since his £10million summer move to the Spanish capital.

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid name star-studded XI to face Liverpool
arts.sum: The XI of players called upon by La Liga giants Real Madrid for the club’s meeting with Liverpool has been unveiled online. And it comes as precisely the same one…

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Real Madrid: Confirmed Starting Lineup Announced For Champions League Clash
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe and Vinicius Jr. start in the forward positions, with Arda Guler and Jude Bellingham looking to push forward and offer an attacking threat. Real Madrid's Starting XI Against Liverpool:
